sql.sql_query:
SELECT table1.CN1##Value Set Name##, table1.CN1##Description##, table1.CN1##List Type##, table1.CN1##Security Type##, table1.CN1##Format Type##, table1.CN1##Maximum Size##, table1.CN1##Precision##, table1.CN1##Numbers Only (0-9)##, table1.CN1##Uppercase Only (A-Z)##, table1.CN1##Right-justify and Zero-fill Numbers (0001)##, table1.CN1##Min Value##, table1.CN1##Max Value##, table1.CN1##Value Validation Type##,
table2.CN2##Independent Value Set Name##, table2.CN2##Independent Value Set Description##, table2.CN2##Dependent Value Set Name##, table2.CN2##Dependent Value Set Description## FROM TBLDATA_TL table1 left join TBLDATA_TL table2 ON table1.CN1##Value Set Name## = table2.CN2##Value Set## and table2.DATAHEADERID=TN2##Dependent Value Set Information - SET## and table2.DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and table2.DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' WHERE table1.DATAHEADERID=TN1##Value Sets - SET## and table1.CN1##Value Validation Type## = 'Independent' and table1.DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and table1.DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' order by table1.DATASEQUENCE

delete_tables.delete_table_name: delete from TBLDATA_TL where DATAHEADERID=TN##Value Sets - SET## and DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' and NAVIGATIONFILTER='GL-Define-Validation-Sets' and DC##Value Validation Type## = 'Independent'

delete from TBLDATA_TL where DATAHEADERID=TN##Dependent Value Set Information - SET## and DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' and NAVIGATIONFILTER='GL-Define-Validation-Sets'

sqls_insert.sql_insert: insert into TN##Value Sets - SET##( DC##BASE_COLUMNS##, NAVIGATIONFILTER, DC##Value Set Name##, DC##Description##, DC##List Type##, DC##Security Type##, DC##Format Type##, DC##Maximum Size##, DC##Precision##, DC##Numbers Only (0-9)##, DC##Uppercase Only (A-Z)##, DC##Right-justify and Zero-fill Numbers (0001)##, DC##Min Value##, DC##Max Value##, DC##Value Validation Type##) values( ##BASE_COLUMNS##, 'GL-Define-Validation-Sets', VALUE##Value Set Name##, VALUE##Description##, VALUE##List Type##, VALUE##Security Type##, VALUE##Format Type##, VALUE##Maximum Size##, VALUE##Precision##, VALUE##Numbers Only (0-9)##, VALUE##Uppercase Only (A-Z)##, VALUE##Right-justify and Zero-fill Numbers (0001)##, VALUE##Min Value##, VALUE##Max Value##, VALUE##Value Validation Type## )

insert into TN##Dependent Value Set Information - SET##( DC##BASE_COLUMNS##, NAVIGATIONFILTER, DC##Value Set##, DC##Independent Value Set Name##, DC##Independent Value Set Description##, DC##Dependent Value Set Name##, DC##Dependent Value Set Description## ) values( ##BASE_COLUMNS##, 'GL-Define-Validation-Sets', VALUE##Value Set Name##, VALUE##Independent Value Set Name##, VALUE##Independent Value Set Description##, VALUE##Dependent Value Set Name##, VALUE##Dependent Value Set Description## )

insert into TN##RSC-Validate-Value-Sets##( DC##BASE_COLUMNS##, NAVIGATIONFILTER, DC##Value Set Name##, DC##Description##, DC##Security Type##, DC##Format Type##, DC##Maximum Size## ) values( ##BASE_COLUMNS##, 'GL-Define-Validation-Sets', VALUE##Value Set Name##, VALUE##Description##, VALUE##Security Type##, VALUE##Format Type##, VALUE##Maximum Size## )

sql.sql_query: SELECT table1.CN1##Number##, table1.CN1##Name##, table1.CN1##Value Set##, table2.CN2##Maximum Size##, table1.CN1##Column##, table1.CN1##Structures - Code##, table1.CN1##Window Prompt##, table3.CN3##Promts - List Of Values##, table3.CN3##Sizes - Display Size##, table4.CN4##Name##, table4.CN4##Enabled##, table3.CN3##Validation - Default Type##, table3.CN3##Validation - Default Value## FROM TBLDATA_TL table1 left join TBLDATA_TL table3 ON table1.CN1##Name## = table3.CN3##Segment Summary - Name## and table3.DATAHEADERID=TN3##KFF - Segments - SEG## and table3.DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and table3.DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' left join TBLDATA_TL table4 ON table1.CN1##Name## = table4.CN4##Segment - Name## and table4.DATAHEADERID=TN4##KFF - Flexfield Qualifiers - QUALIFIERS## and table4.DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and table4.DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' left join TBLDATA_TL table2 ON table1.CN1##Value Set## = table2.CN2##Value Set Name## and table2.DATAHEADERID=TN2##Value Sets - SET## and table2.DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and table2.DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' WHERE table1.DATAHEADERID=TN1##KFF - Segments Summary - SEG## and table1.DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and table1.CN1##Flexfield Title## = 'Accounting Flexfield' and table1.DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' order by table1.DATASEQUENCE

delete_tables.delete_table_name: delete from TBLDATA_TL where DATAHEADERID=TN##KFF - Segments Summary - SEG## and DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' and NAVIGATIONFILTER='GL-KFF-Define-Accounting-Segment'
delete from TBLDATA_TL where DATAHEADERID=TN##KFF - Segments - SEG## and DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' and NAVIGATIONFILTER='GL-KFF-Define-Accounting-Segment'

delete from TBLDATA_TL where DATAHEADERID=TN##KFF - Flexfield Qualifiers - QUALIFIERS## and DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' and NAVIGATIONFILTER='GL-KFF-Update-Flexfield-Qualifiers'

sqls_insert.sql_insert: insert into TN##KFF - Segments Summary - SEG##( DC##BASE_COLUMNS##, NAVIGATIONFILTER, DC##Application##, DC##Flexfield Title##, DC##Structures - Code##, DC##Number##, DC##Name##, DC##Window Prompt##, DC##Column##, DC##Value Set##, DC##Displayed##, DC##Enabled## ) values( ##BASE_COLUMNS##, 'GL-KFF-Define-Accounting-Segment', 'General Ledger', 'Accounting Flexfield', VALUE##Structures - Code##, VALUE##Sequence##, VALUE##Name##, VALUE##Window Prompt##, VALUE##Column##, VALUE##Value Set##, 'Yes', 'Yes' )

insert into TN##KFF - Segments - SEG##( DC##BASE_COLUMNS##, NAVIGATIONFILTER, DC##Application##, DC##Flexfield Title##, DC##Structures - Code##, DC##Segment Summary - Name##, DC##Segment - Name##, DC##Validation - Value Set##, DC##Validation - Default Type##, DC##Validation - Default Value##, DC##Promts - List Of Values##, DC##Sizes - Display Size## ) values( ##BASE_COLUMNS##, 'GL-KFF-Define-Accounting-Segment', 'General Ledger', 'Accounting Flexfield', VALUE##Structures - Code##, VALUE##Name##, VALUE##Name##, VALUE##Value Set##, VALUE##Segment Default Type##, VALUE##Segment Default Value##, VALUE##LOV Prompt##, VALUE##Display size## )

insert into TN##KFF - Flexfield Qualifiers - QUALIFIERS##( DC##BASE_COLUMNS##, NAVIGATIONFILTER, DC##Application##, DC##Flexfield Title##, DC##Structures - Code##, DC##Segment - Name##, DC##Name##, DC##Enabled## ) values( ##BASE_COLUMNS##, 'GL-KFF-Update-Flexfield-Qualifiers', 'General Ledger', 'Accounting Flexfield', VALUE##Structures - Code##, VALUE##Name##, VALUE##Flexfield Qualifier##, VALUE##Enabled## )

sql.sql_query: SELECT table1.CN1##Code##, table1.CN1##Name##, table1.CN1##Enabled## FROM TBLDATA_TL table1 WHERE table1.DATAHEADERID=TN1##Currencies - FND_CURRENCIES## and table1.DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and table1.DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' and table1.NAVIGATIONFILTER='GL-Enable-Currencies' order by table1.DATASEQUENCE

delete_tables.delete_table_name: delete from TBLDATA_TL where DATAHEADERID=TN##Currencies - FND_CURRENCIES## and DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' and NAVIGATIONFILTER='GL-Enable-Currencies'

sqls_insert.sql_insert: insert into TN##Currencies - FND_CURRENCIES##( DC##BASE_COLUMNS##, NAVIGATIONFILTER, DC##Code##, DC##Name##, DC##Enabled## ) values( ##BASE_COLUMNS##, 'GL-Enable-Currencies', VALUE##Code##, VALUE##Name##, VALUE##Enabled## )

sql.sql_query: SELECT * FROM ( select segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Structure##, segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Independent Segment##, segValTable.CN2##Value##, segValTable.CN2##Description##, segValTable.CN2##Enabled##, segValTable.CN2##From##, segValTable.CN2##To##, segValTable.CN2##Parent##, segValTable.CN2##Group##, segValTable.CN2##Level##, segValDFF.CN1##field1##, segValDFF.CN1##field2##, segValDFF.CN1##field3## QUA_ACC from tbldata_tl segValTable left join tbldata_tl segValDFF on (segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Title##=segValDFF.CN1##Segment Values - Title## or (segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Title## is null and segValDFF.CN1##Segment Values - Title## is null)) AND (segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Structure##=segValDFF.CN1##Segment Values - Structure## or (segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Structure## is null and segValDFF.CN1##Segment Values - Structure## is null)) AND (segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Independent Segment##=segValDFF.CN1##Segment Values - Independent Segment## or (segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Independent Segment## is null and segValDFF.CN1##Segment Values - Independent Segment## is null)) AND (segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Dependent Segment##=segValDFF.CN1##Segment Values - Dependent Segment## or (segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Dependent Segment## is null and segValDFF.CN1##Segment Values - Dependent Segment## is null)) AND (segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Independent Value##=segValDFF.CN1##Segment Values - Independent Value## or (segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Independent Value## is null and segValDFF.CN1##Segment Values - Independent Value## is null)) AND (segValTable.CN2##Value##=segValDFF.CN1##Value## or (segValTable.CN2##Value## is null and segValDFF.CN1##Value## is null)) AND segValDFF.DATASTATUS='ENABLE' AND segValDFF.DATAHEADERID=TN1##Segment Values - VALUE - DFF## and segValDFF.DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' where segValTable.DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and segValTable.DATAHEADERID=TN2##Segment Values - VALUE## and segValTable.DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE ='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' and segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Title##='Accounting Flexfield' order by segValTable.CN2##Segment Values - Independent Segment##,segValTable.CN2##Value##)

delete_tables.delete_table_name: delete from TBLDATA_TL where DATAHEADERID=TN##Segment Values - VALUE## and DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' and NAVIGATIONFILTER='GL-KFF-Define-Accounting-Segment-Value'

delete from TBLDATA_TL where DATAHEADERID=TN##Segment Values - VALUE - DFF## and DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' and NAVIGATIONFILTER='GL-KFF-Define-Accounting-Segment-Value'

sqls_insert.sql_insert: insert into TN##Segment Values - VALUE##( DC##BASE_COLUMNS##, NAVIGATIONFILTER, DC##Segment Values - Title##, DC##Segment Values - Structure##, DC##Segment Values - Independent Segment##, DC##Value##, DC##Description##, DC##Enabled##, DC##From##, DC##To##, DC##Parent##, DC##Group##, DC##Level## ) values( ##BASE_COLUMNS##, 'GL-KFF-Define-Accounting-Segment-Value', 'Accounting Flexfield', VALUE##Segment Values - Structure##, VALUE##Segment Values - Independent Segment##, VALUE##Value##, VALUE##Description##, VALUE##Enabled##, VALUE##From##, VALUE##To##, VALUE##Parent##, VALUE##Group##, VALUE##Level## )

insert into TN##Segment Values - VALUE - DFF##( DC##BASE_COLUMNS##, NAVIGATIONFILTER, DC##Segment Values - Title##, DC##Segment Values - Structure##, DC##Segment Values - Independent Segment##, DC##Value##, DC##field1##, DC##field2##, DC##field3## ) values( ##BASE_COLUMNS##, 'GL-KFF-Define-Accounting-Segment-Value', 'Accounting Flexfield', VALUE##Segment Values - Structure##, VALUE##Segment Values - Independent Segment##, VALUE##Value##, VALUE##Qualifiers - Allow Budgeting##, VALUE##Qualifiers - Allow Posting##, VALUE##Qualifiers - Account Type## )

sql.sql_query: SELECT table1.CN1##Organization Code##, table1.CN1##Organization Name##, table1.CN1##Name##, table1.CN1##Description##, table1.CN1##Account## FROM TBLDATA_TL table1 WHERE table1.DATAHEADERID=TN1##Account Aliases - ACCOUNT_ALIAS## and table1.DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and table1.DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##' order by table1.DATASEQUENCE

delete_tables.delete_table_name: delete from TBLDATA_TL where DATAHEADERID=TN##Account Aliases - ACCOUNT_ALIAS## and DATASTATUS='ENABLE' and DATAFILTERINCLUSIVE='##INCLUSIVE_FILTER##'

sqls_insert.sql_insert: insert into TN##Account Aliases - ACCOUNT_ALIAS##( DC##BASE_COLUMNS##, NAVIGATIONFILTER, DC##Organization Code##, DC##Organization Name##, DC##Name##, DC##Description##, DC##Account##) values( ##BASE_COLUMNS##, 'INV-Define-Account-Aliases', VALUE##Organization Code##, VALUE##Organization Name##, VALUE##Name##, VALUE##Description##, VALUE##Account## )
